management_sentiment.reasoning: Record Q1 revenue of $26B (up 262% YoY), strong guidance of $28B for Q2, confident language about 'next industrial revolution' and AI transformation

qa_sentiment.reasoning: Jensen confidently addressed all competitive and technical concerns, emphasized strong demand exceeding supply, and provided detailed roadmap visibility

strategic_focuses.description: Building next-generation data centers that produce artificial intelligence as a commodity
Full production of next-gen platform with 4x training and 30x inference performance improvements
Countries building domestic AI infrastructure, approaching high single-digit billions in revenue
Strong growth in enterprise customers, automotive expected to be largest vertical
NVIDIA NIMs and comprehensive software stack monetization

key_metrics.change: Of trailing four quarters Data Center revenue
For every $1 spent on NVIDIA infrastructure over 4 years

risks.description: Demand exceeding supply for H200 and Blackwell well into next year
Significantly lower revenue due to export controls, increased competition
Cloud customers developing internal chips, though Jensen expressed confidence in NVIDIA's advantages
One-year product cycles creating potential customer timing decisions
